full_text: I'm happy to have a group of people to play pickup vb with every week, but good golly gosh, some of them can be *so* annoying. I can only hope old age keeps mellowing me out until bad teammates/opponents don't drive me up the wall as much.

One errand downtown exhausted me so much, I'm lying down. I think it's renewed Covid anxiety, more than anything. Back to being very wary.
Lovely. Also: Xhaka would get a red for the two-footing in the second photo. https://t.co/si1DVXZ0yh
I don't want Simeone at Arsenal, but it would be tremendously fun to have him in the PL just winding up The Great Men of Football like Guardiola and Klopp to distraction.
Current status: dodging the temptation to try using yet another task manager app and spending hours upon hours setting it up. I deserve a pat on the back.
If you think last week's press lovefest was bad, imagine if Man City and Liverpool play the CL final. Nothing has mattered in football before, and nothing will matter after, I imagine.
